Catherine: Full Body Footage Shows Persona 5's Joker in Action
Related Article
paragraph:
One of the first-print bonuses for Catherine: Full Body is a playable Joker from Persona 5, who will be available via a DLC product code. Joker can be used in Babel and Colosseum modes, and players who don't pick up early copies will get to purchase him sometime after launch. While we wait for the puzzler to return on PS4 and PS Vita next year—February 14 in Japan and sometime after in the west—you can see Joker in action in some recent live stream footage. The live stream took place at Tokyo's Red Bull Gaming Sphere and features pro gamer Tokido, so dig in below and see Joker starting at the 1:27:25 mark.   Via Gematsu -------Joseph Luster is the Games and Web editor at Otaku USA Magazine.
